title: Procedure Design
content: Procedures should be usable: appropriate detail, logical sequence, clear language, realistic in time and workload assumptions. Unusable procedures get ignored or worked around. Compliance requires procedures worth following.

scenario.story: A procedure takes 3 hours to complete properly but is scheduled in 2-hour windows. Operators routinely skip verification steps to finish on time. Management responds to an error by adding more verification steps, making the procedure longer.

options.B: The fundamental mismatch between procedure requirements and time allocation needs resolution

scenario.explanation: Procedures that can't be followed as written will be adapted. Adding steps to an already time-impossible procedure makes compliance less likely, not more. The schedule-procedure mismatch is the root issue requiring resolution.
